name: Golf Superstar 2
description:
Welcome golf fans! Lazy Boy Developments is proud to present a sequel to Golf Superstar!

Start the game as an 18 year old with bags of potential and play until you retire. What happens in-between is up to you!

IMPROVE YOUR ABILITIES
Gain experience to upgrade your character making you a better golfer.

MANAGE RELATIONSHIPS
Build and manage relationships throughout your career. Buy your parents a gift, have a night out with your best friend, perhaps get married and even have a kid!

CONTROL YOUR DESTINY
Throughout your career various decisions and events will mould you as a person. Do you chase the money or focus on becoming the best you can be? How do you handle fame and fortune? And then there's the media and fans to worry about!

INCREASE YOUR WEALTH
Why not invest your hard-earned cash in a golf course, bar, restaurant and many more. After all, you can put that extra cash to good use!

LIVE THE LIFE
With success comes money and fame. Perhaps buy a supercar or even a Yacht? Your lifestyle will make you more appealing to potential endorsement deals!

ARE YOU THE BEST?
Start with small tournaments and work your way to the majors! Can you reach the top?

Prove it…
